article_title: Blumenthal calls on UnitedHealthcare to stay with 'Obamacare'
article_text:
U.S. Sen. Richard Blumenthal said today he is calling on UnitedHealthcare to stay part of President Obama's health care plan.

The move follows UnitedHealth's warning that it may pull plans after next year because of low enrollment and high usage costs.

Officials say if UnitedHealth drops out of 'Obamacare,' consumers would lose one of the lowest-cost plans available. ...

article_summary:
U.S. Sen. Richard Blumenthal said today he is calling on UnitedHealthcare to stay part of President Obama's health care plan.
Officials say if UnitedHealth drops out of 'Obamacare,' consumers would lose one of the lowest-cost plans available.
The move follows UnitedHealth's warning that it may pull plans after next year because of low enrollment and high usage costs.
